titles.title: To prohibit Federal agencies to require or encourage preferences based on race, sex, or ethnic origin, in connection with Federal contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/28/1996--Introduced. Prohibits Federal agencies from implementing, administering, participating in, or enforcing any requirement of, or program of financial incentives for, set-asides or preferences in Federal contracting or subcontracting based on race, sex, or ethnic origin.
